content: times omitting the last 2sc join to the beginning single_crochet with a sl st faste n off and secure ends stitch count 12x2trc clusters 30sc round 6 white join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in same st 1hdc in each of the next 6 sts 2hdc in next st repeat 5 more times omitting the last 2hdc join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 48hdc round 7 red join in the back loop of any st with a standing single_crochet 1sc in the same st working blo 1sc in each of the nex t 3 sts 2sc in next st repeat 11 more times omitting the last 2sc join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 60sc 5 round 8 white for the join in this round choose any popcorn from round 4 spot the second stitch the left one worked into that popcorn in round 5 track up the white half_double_crochet worked in round 6 and up to the red single_crochet that was worked into that st in round 7 you will then start round 8 in the next stitch to the left of the stitch you have tracked up indicated by the blue pin join int o the indicated st ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in same st 1sc in each of the next 3 sts fptrc2tog around the two 2trc clusters from round 5 skip st 1sc in each of the next 9 sts repeat 5 more times omitting the last 4sc join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not fasten off stitch c ount 6fptrc2tog 54sc round 9 white ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in each st around join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 60hdc 6 round 10 green join around the post of any fptrc2tog from round 8 with a standing fptrc working in the st directly behind the fptrc just worked the st to the left of the half_double_crochet worked into the fptrc2tog from round 8 blo 1sc blo 1sc in each of the next 9 sts fptrc around the post of the next fptrc2tog from round 8 blo 1sc in each of the next 10 sts making sure not to skip the st behind the fptrc repea t 4 more times join to the top of the beginning fptrc with a slip_stitch do not fasten_off stitch count 6fptrc 60sc round 11 green ch3 1dc in same st this counts as the 1st v-st skip 2 sts v-st into the next st repeat 20 more times j oin in the 2nd chain of the ch3 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 22v-sts round 12 white join in the 1st double_crochet of any v-st ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in same st 1sc in the ch1-space
